ygData.subject: re: Trolling
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone else notice that the Ocean of Tears seems to be the standard trolling location? Must be becasue its so hard to verify.. So far, down on the ocean floor
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone else notice that the Ocean of Tears seems to be the standard trolling
location? Must be becasue its so hard to verify..
So far, down on the ocean floor we have (gathered from many messageboards)
- The tinkering book
- The best shadowknight unholy sword
- A 50ac breastplate
- Pottery sketches required to make weapon molds..

It must be getting pretty crowded down there with all these super items :).
Seriously though, the guy that came up with the "search beneath the waves" tip
has subsequently apologised and retracted, saying that he was misled.

<Insert silly automatic message from my mail server>
